title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not change immediately in the user interface.
OB: The height of the label does not update after modifying its font size.
EB: The label's height should dynamically adjust to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Modify the font size of a label.
2. Note that the label's height does not change accordingly.
